# ungrouped()

**Instance Method**

Generates a data frame that contains all the rows from each group in the row grouping.

## Declaration

```swift
func ungrouped() -> DataFrame
```

## Discussion

The method discards any column with the same name as the row grouping itself.
title: ungrouped()
